nodes.text: The Machine in the Ghost  (Star Wars Rebels Annual 2015)

"The Machine in the Ghost" is a 2014 short story written by Katrina Pallant and published in the Star Wars Rebels Annual 2015 by Egmont UK Ltd. It adapts the Star Wars Rebels short "The Machine in the Ghost".
The table of contents for Star Wars Rebels Annual 2015 mistakenly titles this short story "The Mission in the Ghost".
